articles.description: There is now a new addition to the magnetic family: thanks to experiments at the Swiss Light Source SLS, researchers have proved the existence of altermagnetism. The experimental discovery of this new branch of magnetism is reported in Nature and signifies ne…

articles.author: Jeff Foust
articles.title: Fueling issue delays Intuitive Machines lunar lander launch - SpaceNews
articles.description: SpaceX postponed the launch of an Intuitive Machines lunar lander by a day after encountering a problem fueling the spacecraft on the launch pad.
articles.content:
TITUSVILLE, Fla. SpaceX postponed the launch of an Intuitive Machines lunar lander by a day after encountering a problem fueling the spacecraft on the launch pad.
